__e: Senator Palmer is to be given carte blanche. Make sure he gets whatever he needs. - Yes, sir.
Ask another, if you seek it granted.
Well, one he shall not see granted.
Your Excellency, grant this one request.
This book grants us all our wishes.
And that's where God grants us her miracles.
Oh, um, grant me one last favour before we go.
But I would like it to be known, and give me a moment because I am a touch emotional,
Seeing that heaven has granted me this last pleasure, I can now die in peace.
How grateful you must be for the safety my sacrifice assured our father... and you.
They give you a vacation must be some reason!
